songs.title: Girl
songs.lyrics:
All these songs have happiness as a base theme
Do you know who caused me so much happiness?

All these songs are based on happiness
All these songs are based on happiness

The happiness you give me is the basis of this
The bases are made of events of
A long time ago, also from
The beautiful moments of the present

You are the reason for my happiness
The reason for so much happiness
The turmoil of your actions

All these songs have happiness as a base theme
Do you know who caused me so much happiness?

All these songs are based on happiness
All these songs are based on happiness

The happiness you give me is the basis of this
The bases are made of events of
A long time ago, also from
The beautiful moments of the present

You are the reason for my happiness
The reason for so much happiness
The turmoil of your actions

You are the happiness that I need, you yourself
You said, you're fucked up, but we're both
You know that you are my happiness, my world, my solution
My all
